Transcript: สวัสดีค่ะคุณนฤมล
เสื้อตาขออนุญาตเวลาไม่เกิน 2 นาทีค่ะพอดีว่ามาสอบถามข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมให้นิดนึงค่ะอันนี้คุยสายได้อยู่นะคะ
English Translation: I would like to ask permission for no more than 2 minutes. I just wanted to ask for a little more information. You can talk on the phone right now.
translate_claude: Excuse me, may I have no more than 2 minutes of your time please? I just wanted to ask for a little more information. We can talk on the phone if that's okay.
revision_claude: Excuse me, may I have no more than 2 minutes of your time please? I just wanted to ask for a little more information. We can talk on the phone if that's okay.

Transcript: ค่ะขออนุญาตสอบถามรายละเอียดเกี่ยวกับไทรอยด์ค่ะคุณลูกค้าตัวนี้คุณลูกค้าอ่ามีการรับประทานยาวันละกี่เม็ดคะตัวนี้วันละ 3 เม็ดเนาะ
English Translation: Yes, please allow me to ask for details about the thyroid, this customer. How many pills do you take per day? This one is 3 pills per day.
translate_claude: Yes, may I ask for details about thyroid? For this customer, how many pills do they take per day? This one is 3 pills per day, right?
revision_claude: Yes, may I ask for details about thyroid? For this customer, how many pills do they take per day? This one is 3 pills per day, right?

Transcript: ของค่ะอันนี้พบแพทย์อันนี้เป็นกี่เดือนครั้งคะหรือว่าทุกเดือน
English Translation: This one, how many times a month do you see this doctor? Or is it every month?
translate_claude: How often do I need to see the doctor for this, is it every few months or every month?
revision_claude: How often do I need to see the doctor for this, is it every few months or every month?

Transcript: มีสามีเป็นผู้รับผลประโยชน์ด้วย
English Translation: The husband is also the beneficiary.
translate_claude: The husband is also a beneficiary.
revision_claude: The husband is also a beneficiary.

Transcript: ค่ะแล้วก็อันนี้สอบถามอาชีพเพิ่มเติมค่ะคุณลูกค้าตัวนี้เป็นพนักงานบริษัทหรือว่าประกอบอาชีพอะไรไหมคะ
English Translation: Yes, and this one asks for additional occupations. Is this customer an employee of a company or what kind of occupation do you have?
translate_claude: Yes, and I would like to ask an additional question about occupation. Is this customer an employee of a company or what is their occupation?
revision_claude: Yes, and I would like to ask an additional question about occupation. Is this customer an employee of a company or what is their occupation?

Transcript: โอเคค่ะอันนี้ข้อมูลครบถ้วนเรียบร้อยแล้วค่ะคุณลูกค้าต้องขออภัยที่รบกวนนะคะค่ะสวัสดีค่ะ
English Translation: Okay, this one has complete information. Dear customer, I apologize for disturbing you. Hello.
translate_claude: Okay, the information is complete now. I apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you, goodbye.
revision_claude: Okay, the information is complete now. I apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you, goodbye.
